title: Justin Bieber Releases 'Sorry' Track - Full Song & Lyrics Here!
text: Justin Bieber‘s new song “Sorry” is here and we already have it on repeat! The 21-year-old singer collaborated with Skillrex again for the track, which appears on his upcoming album Purpose, slated for November 13! Also pictured: Justin hits the carpet at the premiere of Ed Sheeran ‘s new concert film Jumpers For Goalposts held at [...] »
